titleStmt.title: An Italians dead bodie, stucke with English flowers elegies, on the death of Sir Oratio Pallauicino.
titleStmt.author: Field, Theophilus, 1574-1636.
Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printee [sic] by Thomas Creede, for Andrew Wise, and are to be sold at his shop in Powles Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Verses by Theophilus Field (ed.), Joseph Hall, and others.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
